display_long_description:
Bike VR: Bike Stunt Madness delivers the ultimate VR motorcycle experience with extreme stunts, high-speed racing, and freestyle trick action. Ride across massive container tracks floating above water, packed with deadly obstacles, spinning traps, and explosive jumps. Perfect for fans of VR stunt bike games, motorcycle racing simulators, and virtual bike adventure games.
Choose your ride from a growing garage of two-wheeled machines—scooters, Harley-style cruisers, heavy bikes, superbikes, sports motorcycles, dirt bikes, chopper bikes, and more. Each vehicle offers unique handling, top speed, and trick performance to match your stunt style.
Master insane moves like backflips, wheelies, 360 spins, precision jumps, and tight turns on narrow stunt paths. With realistic bike physics, responsive VR controls, and intense level design, this game offers one of the most authentic VR motorcycle stunt simulator experiences available on Meta Quest.
Whether you're looking for VR bike racing, freestyle motocross VR, trial bike challenges, or a realistic motorbike simulator, this game has it all. Unlock new tracks, customize your ride, and rise through the ranks of the world’s best virtual riders.
